meanings.definition: A padded undergarment worn to enhance the appearance of the bust.
meanings.sent1: She wore a falsie to make her dress fit better.
meanings.sent2: The falsie added volume to her outfit.
meanings.sent3: The falsie decided to take a break and relax on the hanger.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence bloomed like a blossoming flower with the help of the falsie.
meanings.sent5: The falsie whispered secrets of glamour to her wardrobe.

meanings.definition: Something that is false or fake.
meanings.sent1: He realized the painting was a falsie after examining it closely.
meanings.sent2: The scam artist tried to sell a falsie as an original.
meanings.sent3: The falsie mask made everyone laugh at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: His promises were as empty as a falsie in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The falsie mirror distorted her reflection like a funhouse.
